primitiveValues.textValue: Mobile App Version Cancel Request AUT

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Mobile App Version Cancel Request AUT

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
{!$Constants.Title}: {!$Constants.Url}

To cancel a CAD withdrawal request on the Ndax mobile app, follow these steps:

  1. On the bottom navigation bar, tap the WALLET icon (to the left of the Ndax logo).
  2. Select Fiat, then tap CAD.
  3. Tap the filter icon in the lower-right corner (three horizontal lines with dots).
  4. Select Filter by Withdrawals.
  5. Tap the withdrawal you wish to cancel to open its details.
  6. Tap Cancel Withdrawal to cancel the request.

Once cancelled, the funds will be immediately available in your Ndax account for trading or withdrawing.
